translation.en: [woman] Look at you. Sitting there.
You think you're good people.
You're not good people.
Trust me.
There's no such thing as good people.
I used to be like you.
Thinking that working hard and playing fair
translation.zh: 认为努力工作和公平竞争

translation.en: would lead to success and happiness.
It doesn't.
Playing fair is a joke
invented by rich people to keep the rest of us poor.
translation.zh: 是有钱人发明的 好让我们这些穷人永远无法翻身

translation.en: And I've been poor.
It doesn't agree with me.
'Cause there's two types of people in this world.
translation.zh: 因为这个世界上只存在两种人

translation.en: The people who take
and those getting took.
Predators and prey.
Lions and lambs.
My name is Marla Grayson, and I'm not a lamb.
translation.zh: 我的名字叫玛拉·葛蕾森 我可不是一只小绵羊

translation.en: I am a fucking lioness.
[man] She's my mother. I should be able to see her whenever I want.
translation.zh: 她是我母亲 我应该有权利随时去看望她

translation.en: She doesn't need to be in a care facility.
She doesn't need a court-appointed guardian.
translation.zh: 她不需要法院指派的监护人

translation.en: She has a loving son to take care of her,
translation.zh: 她有一个好儿子来照顾她

translation.en: and I just don't understand how the court can entrust my mother to this stranger.
translation.zh: 我就是不理解法院怎么可以 把我母亲托付给外人

translation.en: Ms. Grayson forced my mother into the home when she made it very clear
translation.zh: 葛蕾森女士在我妈妈清楚表达了 拒绝的意愿后

translation.en: that she didn't wanna go,
translation.zh: 仍然强制她进入疗养院

translation.en: and now she has auctioned off my mother's house, her car,
translation.zh: 现在她又拍卖了我母亲的房子 她的汽车、她的私人物品

translation.en: her personal belongings,
translation.zh: 她的汽车、她的私人物品

translation.en: and she uses the proceeds to pay herself!
translation.zh: 然后她用这笔收益供自己花销！

translation.en: And now Ms. Grayson has barred me from seeing my mother at all. [gasps]
translation.zh: 现在葛蕾森小姐完全禁止我 看望我母亲

translation.en: It's a goddamn nightmare. She has kidnapped my mother!
translation.zh: 这就是一场噩梦 她绑架了我母亲！

translation.en: Please, sir, calm down.
translation.zh: 先生 请你保持冷静

translation.en: Marla Grayson is a well-respected professional guardian
translation.zh: 玛拉·葛蕾森是一位 受人尊敬的专业监护人

translation.en: and has been appointed by this court, by me,
translation.zh: 并且鉴于你的母亲不能自理

translation.en: to look after the best interests
translation.zh: 她由本法庭以及我本人亲自任命

translation.en: of your mother now that she cannot look after herself.
translation.zh: 在最大程度上维护你母亲的利益

translation.en: How is it in my mother's best interest to have her son barred from seeing her?
translation.zh: 禁止儿子的探访是怎么 在最大程度上维护我母亲的利益的？

translation.en: Ms. Grayson doesn't care about my mother at all.
translation.zh: 葛蕾森女士根本不关心我的母亲

translation.en: Excuse me, Your Honor. May I speak?
translation.zh: 对不起 法官大人 我能发言吗？

translation.en: Go ahead, Ms. Grayson.
Mr. Feldstrom, sir.
translation.zh: 费尔德斯托姆男士 先生

translation.en: I sympathize,
but the court doesn't appoint me for no reason.
translation.zh: 但是法庭不会无缘无故委托我的

translation.en: -Your mother couldn't cope on her own. -That is not true.
translation.zh: -你的母亲生活不能自理 -这不是真的

translation.en: A doctor diagnosed her with dementia, Mr. Feldstrom, and wrote an affidavit
translation.zh: 医生已经诊断她患有老年痴呆 费尔德斯托姆先生 并且提供了

translation.en: recommending immediate action be taken for her safety.
translation.zh: 建议立刻采取措施 来保障她安全的证词

translation.en: You had ample opportunity
to move your mother into a care facility or into your home.
translation.zh: 送她去疗养院 或者带她去你家

translation.en: You did neither.
She didn't want to leave her home, okay? She begged me not--
translation.zh: 她不想离开自己的家 好吗？ 她求我不要…

translation.en: You can't care for her by doing what she wants.
translation.zh: 你不能按照她的意愿来照顾她

translation.en: You have to do what she needs.
translation.zh: 你必须按照她的需要来照顾

translation.en: And that is why I can care better than a family member
translation.zh: 这就是为什么我比她的家人 更适合照料她

translation.en: because I have no skin in the game.
translation.zh: 因为我不会牵扯个人利益进来

translation.en: I just do what is right for your mother.
translation.zh: 我只会为你妈妈做对她正确的事

translation.en: So yes, I manage your mother's money because someone has to.
translation.zh: 所以我承认 我管理着你母亲的财产 因为必须有人打理

translation.en: She'd let it run into quite a mess.
translation.zh: 她自己处理只会一团糟

translation.en: And I have to pay for her care in the facility.
translation.zh: 并且我必须支付她的疗养费用

translation.en: So yes, I oversaw the sale of some of her assets to finance that,
translation.zh: 所以我承认 我监管了 她的一部分金融资产的出售

translation.en: and yes, I pay myself, too, because caring, sir, is my job.
translation.zh: 我承认 我也收取了我的工资 因为看护是我的工作 先生

translation.en: It's my profession.
This is what I do.
All-day, every day, I care.
translation.zh: 每一天 每个小时 我都在看护

translation.en: I care for those who are in need of protection.
translation.zh: 我照看那些需要保护的人

translation.en: Protection from apathy, protection from their own pride,
translation.zh: 保护他们不受冷落 保护他们的自尊

translation.en: and quite often, protection from their own children.
translation.zh: 并且经常性地 保护他们不受自己孩子的伤害

translation.en: -Hey, no-- -Your Honor.
You and I have seen it many times, offspring
who are willing to let their parents starve in squalor and struggle with pain
translation.zh: 子女们宁愿让自己的父母缺衣少食 忍受病痛

translation.en: rather than dip into what they see as their inheritance
translation.zh: 也不愿意动用他们已经视为遗产的钱

translation.en: to pay for the necessary care.
translation.zh: 来支付必要的看护费用

translation.en: Mr. Feldstrom, sir.
translation.zh: 费尔德斯特伦男士 先生

translation.en: I sympathize, I do,
but your visits to your mother upset her,
translation.zh: 但你对你妈妈的探望让她难过

translation.en: and the last time you visited her, you assaulted a staff member
translation.zh: 上次你去看望的时候 你袭击了一位工作人员

translation.en: and vandalized a reception area.
translation.zh: 并且蓄意破环了接待区域

translation.en: Is that not true?
Well…
Your Honor, I think it's obvious
why the non-visitation order must be upheld.
translation.zh: 下达谢绝探访命令的理由 已经非常充分

translation.en: This court is doing its best to protect and help Mrs. Feldstrom,
translation.zh: 这个法庭理应尽全力保护和帮助 费尔德斯特伦女士

translation.en: and the actions of her son
are undermining our every effort in that fight.
translation.zh: 正在损害我们在这场斗争中的 全部努力

translation.en: I agree. Order upheld.
[Feldstrom] What? No!
You won?
-I did. -I knew you would.
[Feldstrom] Hey!
Bitch.
-You! Bitch! -I think he's talking to you.
translation.zh: 说你呢！ -臭娘们儿！ -我觉得他在跟你说话

translation.en: -Then he can use my name. -Bitch!
Hey! I don't know how you live with yourself. Okay?
Our lives are being ruined.
I'm just doing my job.
translation.zh: 我只是在完成我的工作

translation.en: Your-- Your-- Your fucking job?
-Fuck you! -Hey! Hey!
I hope you get raped, and I hope you get murdered,
translation.zh: 我祝你被强奸 我祝你被谋杀

translation.en: and I hope you get killed!
You fucking fucker!
Fuck no, motherfucker. I'll fucking get you--
translation.zh: 活够了吧 你这混蛋 小心我…

translation.en: Does it sting more because I'm a woman?
translation.zh: 因为我是女的 你是不是更憋屈了？

translation.en: That you got so soundly beaten in there by someone with a vagina?
translation.zh: 竟然被一个娘们搞得一败涂地？

translation.en: Having a penis doesn't automatically make you more scary to me.
translation.zh: 长了根老二不代表我会不自觉地怕你

translation.en: Just the opposite.
You may be a man,
but if you ever
threaten, touch, or spit on me again,
translation.zh: 再威胁我、碰我或者冲我吐痰一次

translation.en: I will grab your dick and balls,
and I will rip them clean off.
translation.zh: 然后我会把它们连根扯掉

translation.en: You understand?
I'll tell your mom you send your best.
translation.zh: 我会告诉你妈 你送上了最诚挚的祝福

translation.en: Thanks.
Curtis.
[woman 1] Hey! Good going.
[woman 2] Fran, you did it!
Hi, boss. Congrats on the win.
translation.zh: 嗨 老板 恭喜你胜诉了

translation.en: Thanks, Addie. So, what time is it now?
translation.zh: 谢谢 艾迪 现在几点了？

translation.en: It's 2:17. That's door-to-door, that's just over five hours.
translation.zh: 现在是2点17分 加上往返路程 差不多用了5个多小时

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -Round it to six, charge it to the Feldstrom account. Full rate.
translation.zh: 就算六个小时吧 向费尔德斯特伦的账户收费 收全价

translation.en: Okay. Oh, Sam Rice called, asked that you return.
translation.zh: 好 山姆·莱斯打过电话 叫你回电话

translation.en: Sure. I'll take it inside.
translation.zh: 好的 我等下在屋里打

translation.en: Hey, Fran, call the Realtor. Check progress on the Bather property.

translation.en: The savings account is nearly empty.

translation.en: It won't cover the facility bill after this month.

translation.en: Got you.
[Addie] Sam's on!
Sam, how are you?
[on phone] Hey, I'm good, Marla. How about you?

translation.en: Oh, working hard, playing hard.
translation.zh: 努力工作 努力玩耍

translation.en: -Fuckin' A. -You called.
Yeah. Uh… I got some news.

translation.en: Good news or bad news?
Uh, sort of both.
Uh, your ward, Alan Levitt, here at our Berkshire Oaks facility,
translation.zh: 你的受监护人 艾伦·李维特 在我们巴克夏奥克斯这个分院

translation.en: he just died.
What?
Alan died this morning. Sorry.
translation.zh: 艾伦今天早上走的 抱歉

translation.en: No. Alan Levitt, really?
translation.zh: 不 艾伦·莱维特 真的吗？

translation.en: -How? -Stroke. Big one.
But he was young.
Just 69 and a quarter.
translation.zh: 刚刚六十九岁零三个月大

translation.en: Oh God. [clicks tongue]
Alan.
Fuck, I only had him six months.

translation.en: I thought he'd last us at least another five years.

translation.en: Fuck. Now I have to cash him out, turn over everything to his inheritors.

translation.en: What a fucking waste.
Maybe he took a shine to you and wrote you into his will.
translation.zh: 也许他觉得你人不错 把你写进遗嘱里呢

translation.en: -Yeah, right. -[laughs]
So what's the good news?
Well, due to Alan's tragic departure, we now have a vacancy.
translation.zh: 因为艾伦的悲痛离去 我们现在有空位了

translation.en: His room.
-Huh. That's a corner deluxe. -Yes, it is.
Hold it for me.
Marla, you're not the only game in town. There's a waiting list.
translation.zh: 玛拉 你不是城里唯一的玩家 我这儿还有候补名单呢

translation.en: Fuck the waiting list. How much?
translation.zh: 去他的候补名单 多少钱？

translation.en: Two grand a week till it's filled.

translation.en: Two grand? It cost 500 last time.

translation.en: If you don't pay, someone else will.

translation.en: Oh, fuck you, Sam. All right, two grand.

translation.en: Thanks, Sam.
Pleasure, Marla.
What?
You know.
Keep your eyes on the road.
-Be right back! -Hi, Petra.
Dr. Karen is expecting me.
Alan Levitt? Fuck!
Sorry, I thought he had legs.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我还以为他会很长寿

translation.en: I know, so now we're in the market for a new client.
translation.zh: 我知道 所以我们现在 正在市场上寻找新客户

translation.en: Got anyone for us?
Well, there's a few I wouldn't mind getting off my books, you know,
translation.zh: 我的确想摆脱掉几个人

translation.en: the real high-maintenance assholes,
but there is actually someone I have been meaning to talk to you about.

translation.en: I've been feeling her out, and I think she-- I think she might be--

translation.en: No.
-I don't even want to say it. -A cherry?
Yes. Maybe. I think so.
translation.zh: 是的 也许吧 我觉得是

translation.en: Yeah. We have a chunk.
-Sign some over to me. -[laughs]
Come on. I'm helping you feed the money monster,
translation.zh: 拜托 我在帮你挣大钱

translation.en: but I hardly see any of the gold for myself.

Done.

translation.en: Jennifer Peterson.
She's in reasonably good health,

translation.zh: 但在最近 她出现一些失忆和糊涂的症状

translation.en: Significant?
No, but we can tickle that to make an emergency hearing go our way.
translation.zh: 不严重 但是我们可以操纵这点 举行一场按我们的方式进行的听审

translation.en: She has no kids. No husband.
translation.zh: 她没有子女 没有丈夫

translation.en: No living family.
No family at all?
She has very good insurance.
She told me she used to work in finance in Chicago and moved here to retire.
translation.zh: 她告诉我她以前在芝加哥做金融工作 然后搬到这里退休

translation.en: Can I get a copy of all this?
You bet. [gasps]
All except her test results. That wouldn't be ethical.

translation.en: Of course.
[Fran] Jennifer Peterson, born April 15th, 1949.
translation.zh: 詹妮弗·彼得森 1949年4月15日生人

translation.en: She lives at 41 Williams Street in Shallcross.
translation.zh: 她住在沙尔克罗斯的威廉姆斯街41号

translation.en: It's a real nice neighborhood.
Expensive.
She bought the house seven years ago. Owns it outright.
translation.zh: 她七年前买了这栋住房 完全拥有产权

translation.en: Credit check came back A1, totally clean.

translation.en: No debt, no criminal record,

translation.en: never been married.
She worked at the same company for 40 years.
translation.zh: 她在同一家公司工作了四十年

translation.en: [instructor] Turn to the side! Kick those legs!
Looks like she downsized when she retired.

translation.en: -Liquidated. -[camera clicks]
And now she's sitting on a nest egg.
translation.zh: 现在她坐在一窝金蛋上

translation.en: Like a golden fucking goose.
Look at this.
From her tax records,
it says that she has three separate saving accounts,
translation.zh: 上面显示她有三个单独的储蓄账户

translation.en: all earning monster interest.
translation.zh: 都在替她赚取高额利息

translation.en: She likes to go during the day to the movies.
She reads a lot, likes gardening.
translation.zh: 她经常读书 喜欢园艺

translation.en: Just your regular old lady.

translation.en: -And she is sitting on a pile of cash. -Uh-huh.
[clicks tongue] She's rich, independent, literate.
That lady right there, she's my fucking hero.
translation.zh: 这位女士简直就是我的英雄啊

translation.en: Karen, it's Marla.
Pull the trigger on Jennifer Peterson.

translation.en: You'll get the stock you want.

translation.en: and has exhibited memory and coping issues.

translation.en: Her mobility is compromised.

translation.en: She has no family?

translation.en: [sighs] Okay, Ms. Grayson.
Do you think you can take her on as one of your wards?

translation.en: I know you have a lot in your fold already.

translation.en: Yes. Your Honor,

Ms. Peterson, my name is Marla Grayson.

translation.en: May I speak with you for a minute?
Good morning, Ms. Peterson. I'm sorry to disturb you so early.

translation.en: You're a doctor?
No, ma'am. I, uh--
May I show you this?
Oh, I'm gonna need my reading glasses. I'll be right back.

translation.en: Jennifer Peterson, your date of birth, your social security number,

translation.en: and this address.
Oh my goodness. Have I done something wrong?

translation.en: Oh no, ma'am. Uh, this is to help you.
translation.zh: 没有 女士 这是为了帮助你

translation.en: The court has ruled under the guidance of your doctor

translation.en: and the court has appointed me to be your legal guardian.

translation.en: What? I don't--
When we cease to be able to take adequate care of ourselves,
translation.zh: 当我们无法充分照顾自己的时候

I'm afraid it's not up to you or me to decide.

translation.zh: 而作为你的法定监护人 确保你无论什么时候

translation.en: that adequate care is supplied to you at all times.
translation.zh: 都受到充分地照料是我的职责所在

translation.en: Let me tell you something. I never went to court.
translation.zh: 让我告诉你吧 我从没上过法庭

translation.en: This is the first thing I've heard about court.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次听说法院找我

translation.en: In emergencies, the court can convene
translation.zh: 在紧急情况下 法庭可以在

translation.en: without the presence of the prospective ward.
translation.zh: 潜在监护人未到场的情况下开庭

translation.en: Wow. That's crazy.
Well, ma'am, you have to come with me.
translation.zh: 女士 你必须跟我走

translation.en: I'm not going anywhere.
This is a court order, and if you don't comply with it,
translation.zh: 这是法院的命令 如果你拒绝执行

translation.en: I'm afraid you may be in some trouble.
Oh my God.
If you feel there's been an error, report it to the court, request a hearing.
translation.zh: 如果你觉得有什么误会 请向法庭报告 申请一场听审

translation.en: But for now, I would suggest you come with me temporarily
translation.zh: 但是现在 我还是建议你暂时跟我去一趟

translation.en: to the care facility I found for you, and if there's been a mistake,
translation.zh: 我为你找到的疗养所 如果你觉得有什么误会

translation.en: we can address it from there.
This is Frances. She will help you pack a suitcase.
translation.zh: 这位是弗朗西丝 她会帮你收拾行李

translation.en: Good morning, Mrs. Peterson. Pleasure to meet you.
translation.zh: 早上好 很高兴认识你

translation.en: -I don't believe this is happening. -Oh, it's totally fine. It's gonna be--
translation.zh: -我不敢相信会发生这种事 -完全没事的

translation.en: -Don't touch me. -I'm sorry. I'll help--
Don't touch me!
Beautiful house, Mrs. Peterson.
translation.zh: 家里很漂亮 彼得森女士

translation.en: Let me help you with those.
I'll be overseeing the upkeep of your property until you sort this out.
translation.zh: 我会监督维护你的房产 直到你自己能处理

translation.en: Let's go. We just wanna make sure
translation.zh: 我们走吧 我们只想确保

translation.en: that your property is taken care of safely.
translation.zh: 你的财产能被安全地维护

translation.en: Thanks, Curtis.
Seat belt.
[Sam] Marla, how's it going? You have to drag her out by her ankles?
translation.zh: 玛拉 情况如何了？ 她是不是不肯就范？

translation.en: No, she packed and walked.
translation.zh: 没 她收拾好行李就跟我们走了

translation.en: Hardly any of them fight.
They see the official paper. They see the cops. They go right along.
translation.zh: 他们看到官方文件和警察 就会乖乖跟我们走了

translation.en: Yeah, I'd fucking fight.
translation.zh: 换我的话 可不会乖乖就范

translation.en: Yeah, you say that,
but at heart, most of us are weak, compliant, scared.
translation.zh: 但是本质上 我们大多数都很 软弱、温顺、胆小

translation.en: True. Hey, you ever hear about the Milgram experiment?
translation.zh: 确实 你听说过米尔格拉姆实验吗？

translation.en: Not now, Sam. We're already in transit.
translation.zh: 现在别聊这个 山姆 我们已经在送她过去了

translation.en: All right.
Oh, Sam, I need the full works for this one.
translation.zh: 山姆 我们接待她 要上全套戏码

translation.en: Copy that.
Welcome home.
[Sam] Come on in.
-I'd forgotten how big they are. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我都忘了房间有多大了 -是啊

translation.en: Why don't you take a seat?
So you feel at home.
They have all your medical details here, all your prescriptions.
translation.zh: 他们知道你所有的健康状况 所有你要吃的药

translation.en: You don't have to worry. They'll take care of all of it.
translation.zh: 不用担心 他们会照顾好一切的

translation.en: Now, if you need me at any time,
translation.zh: 如果你需要我 任何时候都可以

translation.en: night or day, you just ask, okay?
translation.zh: 不管是白天还是晚上 说一声就行 好吗？

translation.en: You have a cell phone?
Unlock it. I'll store my number.
translation.zh: 解锁吧 我会存上我的号码

translation.en: -Oh! -If you need to make a call,
you just ask, okay?
Now, Ms. Peterson, I wanna say I'm honored to be your guardian.
translation.zh: 现在 彼得森小姐 我想说 我很荣幸能成为你的监护人

translation.en: And remember, I'm on your side.
translation.zh: 请记住 我是你这边的

translation.en: I'm here to help.
Sam, you treat this lady like a queen, you hear me?
translation.zh: 山姆 你要像对待女王那样 对待这位女士 你听见了吗？

translation.en: -Anything she wants. -Absolutely.
You take care, Ms. Peterson. We'll talk soon.
translation.zh: 保重 彼得森女士 我们会很快再见的

translation.en: So, we've got some stuff in here. We've got four of them.
Can you open the door? I just wanna get some air.
-You got to go that way. -I just want to get some air.
translation.zh: -你得往那边走 -我只是想透透气

translation.en: Could you open the door so I can get some air?
translation.zh: 能开下门 让我透透气吗？

translation.en: -You got to go back that way! -Huh? -You got to go back that way! -All right.
I need to get you to the rec.
Can you grab those?
-Thank you. It's been a pleasure. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 这是我的荣幸

translation.en: Forty-five. One more? Here.
translation.zh: 四十五号 这位男士

translation.en: Sold.
[Marla] God, I love your ass!
Hi!
I wondered if you could help me, please. I need my cell phone.
translation.zh: 不知道能否请你帮我一下 我需要用一下我的手机

translation.en: Could you find it for me?
Ms. Peterson, cell phones are kept secure for the safety of our guests.
translation.zh: 彼得森女士 为了我们贵宾的安全 手机会被放置到保险的地方

translation.en: My cell phone won't hurt you.
translation.zh: 我的手机不会伤害到你的

translation.en: Our policy is to get your guardian involved--
translation.zh: 我们的原则是要经过你的监护人…

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. I don't want my guardian. You know what?
translation.zh: 不 我不需要我的监护人 你知道吗？

translation.en: -I can call-- -Can I speak to the manager?
translation.zh: -我可以打给… -我能和负责人谈谈吗？

translation.en: Mr. Rice is unavailable right now.
translation.zh: 莱斯先生现在没时间见你

translation.en: Mr. Rice is here, but he's unavailable.
translation.zh: 莱斯先生就在这儿 但是他没时间见我

translation.en: -Mr. Rice! -Hey! Mrs.--
-Calm down. -Don't touch me!
-I need you to calm down. -Why are you touching me like this?
translation.zh: -我需要你冷静下来 -你们为什么要这样碰我？

translation.en: -I know. -I was calm until--
-Go away from me! -Calm down.
-No, no, no. Don't let them do that to me! -Ms. Peterson, I want you to be calm.
translation.zh: -不 别让他们那样对我！ -彼得森女士 我希望你冷静下来

translation.en: Okay.
Is this the key to one of your safety deposit boxes?
translation.zh: 这是你们银行某个保险柜的钥匙吗？

translation.en: Taxi for Ms. Peterson.
Oh, she doesn't live here anymore.
What?
She moved.
Ms. Peterson moved.
Oh. My mistake. Thank you.
Excuse me. Who called you?
translation.zh: 麻烦问一下 谁给你打电话的？

translation.en: Excuse me!
Fuck.
Sir, he's alone.
So, where is she?
Er-- She-- She wasn't at the house.
-You were there on time? -Yes. Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -你准时到那儿了？ -是的 先生

translation.en: Um… no.
In seven years, she's never missed an appointment.
translation.zh: 七年来 她从来没有错过约定的见面

translation.en: The house was changed.
It had been, um, cleared out,
and there was a, uh, "For Sale" sign out front.
translation.zh: 前门外面挂着“待售”的标志

translation.en: There's people inside. They were painting walls.
translation.zh: 里面有人 他们在刷墙

translation.en: I spoke to a woman with some swatches, and she said, uh,
translation.zh: 我跟一个 拿着布料样品的女人说话 她说

translation.en: that she didn't live there anymore.
I don't understand.
What people were in there? Where is she now?
translation.zh: 里面都是谁？她现在在哪儿？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. I-- I came straight here.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我直接来的这里

translation.en: You didn't think to ask,
translation.zh: 你明明知道这对我有多重要

translation.en: even though you know how important this is to me?
You didn't think to get some basic information on the situation?
translation.zh: 你没想过要了解一下基本情况吗？

translation.en: Sir. If-- if I--
Please, sir.
Please.
I-- I figured I'd-- Before anyone--
You fucked up, Alexi.
translation.zh: 你搞砸了 亚历克西

translation.en: I love my mother very much,
and these days, these rare days that we get
translation.zh: 而这种日子 这种我们偶尔

translation.en: to spend together are a blessing for me.
translation.zh: 一起度过的几天日子 是对我的赐福

translation.en: Yes, sir. Of course.
translation.zh: 是的 先生 当然了

translation.en: So you find her and bring her to me.
translation.zh: 所以你去找到她 然后把她带到我这儿

translation.en: [softly] Now.
Of course. Yes, sir. Yes.
translation.zh: 没问题 好的 先生

translation.en: [Marla] And I open the pouch, and what's inside?
translation.zh: 然后我打开了袋子 你猜里面是什么？

translation.en: Diamonds.
Lots.
-Just loose diamonds? -Uh-huh.
This is her insurance for the safe deposit box.
She lists the gold, the jewelry, the bonds,
translation.zh: 她列出了黄金、首饰、债券

translation.en: but not the diamonds.
She insures a 600 dollar watch,
translation.zh: 她给六百美元的手表买了保险

translation.en: but not millions of dollars worth of diamonds.
translation.zh: 但是没保几百万美元的钻石

translation.en: Do you think they're stolen?
translation.zh: 你觉得它们是被偷来的？

translation.en: Probably.
She doesn't seem that type.
Don't get fooled by old people.
Even sadistic, immoral assholes get old.
translation.zh: 即使是虐待狂和无耻的混蛋也会变老

translation.en: But you're missing the point.
The point is these diamonds don't officially exist.
translation.zh: 重点是这些钻石不是公开存在的

translation.en: So…
no one would ever miss them.
-You wanna steal them? -No.
I wanna change their location for a while for safekeeping…
translation.zh: 我想改变保管它们的位置 存放一段时间

translation.en: and see what happens.
[softly] Yes?
Sorry, sir, I-- I can come back later, if--
translation.zh: 抱歉 先生 我可以晚点再过来…

translation.en: Did you find my mother?
Sort of.
[Lunyov] She's in a care home.
[Alexi] As far as I can tell, sir. I-- I couldn't get access.
translation.zh: （出售） 据我目前所知 先生 我无法进去

translation.en: Sir, the latest batch of mules arrived this morning.
translation.zh: 先生 最后一批毒骡今天早上到了

translation.en: Did we lose any in transit?
Three.
We're getting the product from the others at the Medfield property.
translation.zh: 我们会在梅德菲尔德的房子那儿 从他们手里拿到货

translation.en: Is that my smoothie?
She checked herself into a care home?
translation.zh: 她把自己送进了养老院？

translation.en: No.
She's there by court order.
translation.zh: 她是被法院命令送去的

translation.en: She's now a ward of the state.
translation.zh: 她现在是政府的被监护人了

translation.en: Your-- your mother's doctor deemed her incapable of taking care of herself.
translation.zh: 你妈妈的医生 认为她没有能力照顾自己

translation.en: But that's bullshit.
[Alexi chuckles] Yes, sir. Yes.
So how did this happen?
Marla Grayson.
I believe she made it happen. She's your mother's guardian.
translation.zh: 我认为这是她干的 她是你母亲的监护人

translation.en: She now has full control of your mother's life and assets.
translation.zh: 她现在完全接管了 你母亲的人生和财产

translation.en: [yells] Fuck!
Call Dean.
Get my mother out of that home and keep her out.
translation.zh: 把我妈妈带出那个养老院 保障她的安全

translation.en: Do it quietly.
Do it legally. Do it fast. Keep me away from it.
translation.zh: 解决得合法且干脆一点 别把我牵扯进去

translation.en: Yes, sir.
No, no, no.
Leave the photograph.
Marla Grayson? Pleasure to meet you.
translation.zh: 玛拉·葛蕾森？很高兴认识你

translation.en: Dean Ericson.
He says he has an appointment, but he's not in the book.
translation.zh: 他说他有预约 但他不在名单里

translation.en: I just need five minutes of your time, please. It's very important.
translation.zh: 请允许我占用你五分钟的时间 这非常重要

translation.en: You can have two minutes.
This is a beautiful office.
Very stylish. These all your wards?
translation.zh: 很有格调 这些都是你的被监护人？

translation.en: What can I do for you, Mr. Ericson?
translation.zh: 我有什么可以效劳的？ 埃里克森先生

translation.en: It must be a hell of a responsibility all these people.
translation.zh: 身上担着这么多人的责任 你一定忙得不可开交吧？

translation.en: I imagine the paperwork is brutal.
translation.zh: 我可以想象到文书工作有多繁重

translation.en: Take a seat. Get to the point.
-I'm a lawyer. -I don't need a lawyer.
translation.zh: -我是一位律师 -我不需要律师

translation.en: I represent Jennifer Peterson.
Really?
Yes, and I think there's been a mistake.
translation.zh: 是的 我觉得存在着什么误会

translation.en: You see, my client is very capable of taking care of herself.
translation.zh: 你看 我的客户非常有能力照顾自己

translation.en: She has no need for the care of a guardian like yourself.
translation.zh: 她不需要像你这样的一位监护人

translation.en: Of course, this is no reflection on you.
translation.zh: 当然了 我并不是在表达不满

translation.en: I'm sure you're providing absolutely stellar care for Ms. Peterson,
translation.zh: 我确定你为彼得森女士 提供了绝对优秀的看护服务

translation.en: but the fact of the matter is she does not need nor want your care.
translation.zh: 但是实际情况是 她既不需要也不想要你的看护

translation.en: She was perfectly fine on her own.
She called you?
What? Jennifer? She called you from the facility?
translation.zh: -什么？ -她在疗养院里打电话给你了？

translation.en: She did.
When did you last see Jennifer?
translation.zh: 你上次见她是什么时候？

translation.en: -Not long ago. -How long ago?
-Just a few weeks. -A few? Two, three, four?
translation.zh: -就几周吧 -几周呢？两周、三周、四周？

translation.en: Three? Maybe four? Three.
And she was fine, more than fine.
translation.zh: 她很好 她再好不过了

translation.en: She was fitter and more focused than I am most of the time.
translation.zh: 她大多数时间比我还更健康更专注

translation.en: I'm afraid that explains it.
Two weeks ago, Jennifer's health took a severe downwards turn.
translation.zh: 两周前 詹妮弗的健康出现了 严重恶化

translation.en: She has memory loss indicative of dementia,
translation.zh: 她出现了记忆衰退 这是老年痴呆的表现

translation.en: and her doctor was so worried about her,
translation.zh: 而她的医生非常担心她

translation.en: she referred her to the courts for emergency help.
translation.zh: 她向法院寻求紧急帮助

translation.en: That's simply not true, Ms. Grayson.
translation.zh: 这都是瞎掰的 葛蕾森女士

translation.en: You know it, I know it,
if the doctor wrote a note, he knows it too.
translation.zh: 如果医生真的写了批条 那他也很清楚

translation.en: She.
-What? -She. The doctor. She's a she.
Of course.
Now,
I know what you do here. I know your game, your hustle.
translation.zh: 我知道你在玩什么 我了解你的游戏 你的强取豪夺

translation.en: -You do? -I do.
And honestly, it's a good one.
translation.zh: 老实说 这是个好办法

translation.en: You saw an opportunity, and you grabbed it.
translation.zh: 你看到了机会 就抓住了

translation.en: Look at all these cash cows on your wall
translation.zh: 看看你墙上挂的这些摇钱树

translation.en: just leaking money into your account one overpriced hour at a time.
translation.zh: 不断地往你的账户里送钱 简直日进斗金

translation.en: Good for you. I'm not here to ruin your business.
translation.zh: 你干得很好 我不是来毁你生意的

translation.en: I'm happy for you to keep milking these poor, vulnerable people
translation.zh: 你能继续榨干这群又穷又脆弱的人 我很为你开心

translation.en: for as long as you damn well please.
Hell, if your whole enterprise isn't the perfect example
translation.zh: 天啊 如果你的事业不是美国梦的

translation.en: of the American dream,
I don't know what is.
translation.zh: 我就不知道什么才是了

translation.en: But not Jennifer Peterson. She's off-limits.
translation.zh: 但是詹妮弗·彼得森不行 没人可以碰她

translation.en: And I get it. I understand why you targeted her.
translation.zh: 我理解 我明白你为什么瞄准了她

translation.en: -I just responded to a call from a doctor. -Right. Sure.
translation.zh: -我只是按照医生的建议做的 -是啊 当然

translation.en: Let's stick with that, but her doctor is mistaken.
translation.zh: 我们暂且认为是这样 但是她的医生误诊了

translation.en: Understand he-- Sorry, she fucked up.
translation.zh: 听懂了吗 他… 抱歉 她搞砸了

translation.en: Jennifer needs to be released from your care ASAP,
translation.zh: 詹妮弗需要尽快脱离你的看护

translation.en: and you need to get that she-doctor to write another letter
translation.zh: 你需要让那个女医生再写一封信

translation.en: saying Jennifer's made a full recovery
and no longer needs to be in the care of a guardian.
translation.zh: 并且不再需要受到监护人的照顾了

translation.en: Now, why the fuck would I do that?
Well, I can think of two reasons.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 我能想到两个理由

translation.en: One, it is the right thing to do, but I doubt that means anything to you,
translation.zh: 第一 这样做是正确的 不过我猜这对你来说毫无意义

translation.en: and two, because she has very powerful friends
translation.zh: 第二 因为她有几个 可以让你过不得舒服的

translation.en: who can make life uncomfortable for you.
Extremely unpleasant and uncomfortable.
Is that a threat?
No, no. That's just data for you to collate.
translation.zh: 不 这只是你需要知道的背景资料

translation.en: How uncomfortable are we talking?
You know, aggressively and excessively uncomfortable,
and then eventually,
well…
uh, let's just say you'll not be comfortable
translation.zh: 这样说吧 你就再也感受不到

translation.en: or uncomfortable ever again.
-Because I'll be dead? -What?
I-- I didn't say that!
But we all die, right?
translation.zh: 但每个人都会死 对吧？

translation.en: Some of us will just die sooner
translation.zh: 只不过有人死的早了点

translation.en: in a more horribly protracted and painful way.
translation.zh: 以一种更可怕、痛苦的方式死去

translation.en: Who do you work for?
-Jennifer Peterson. -Liar.
-Excuse me? -Liar.
Jennifer did not call you from the facility.
translation.zh: 詹妮弗没从疗养院给你打电话

translation.en: You think I'm stupid enough to let new wards anywhere near a working phone?
translation.zh: 你以为我会蠢到让我的新被监护人 轻易拿到能打通的电话？

translation.en: And I know from her paperwork her lawyer is a local guy
translation.zh: 我从她的文件里得知 她的律师是

translation.en: who deals in family law, and that's not you.
translation.zh: 处理家庭法的本地人 不是你

translation.en: -You're a shark… -[laughs]
…which intrigues me, and I want to know who hired you.
translation.zh: 想威胁我的恶鲨 我想知道是谁雇了你

translation.en: -Release her from your care. -No, Dean.
translation.zh: -让她脱离你的监护 -不 迪恩

translation.en: I don't think I will.
I didn't want to have to do this.
translation.zh: 我以为没必要用这招呢

translation.en: It's 150,000 dollars in cash.
Well, that's very pretty.
It's yours when you release her.
translation.zh: 你放她走 这就都是你的

translation.en: You know what I think, Dean?
translation.zh: 你知道我怎么想吗 迪恩？

translation.en: I think if your opening gambit is a hundred and fifty grand,
translation.zh: 如果你谈判的开场白是十五万美元

translation.en: then Jennifer Peterson must be worth a lot, lot more than that
translation.zh: 那么对于派你来的人来说 詹妮弗·彼得森的价值

translation.en: to whoever it is who sent you here.
I can go to 250.
How about
five million.
-[laughs] Three hundred. -Million?
Thousand.
Final offer.
Dean, I have a legal duty.
translation.zh: 迪恩 我有着法律责任

translation.en: Jennifer Peterson is in need of my protection.
translation.zh: 詹妮弗·彼得森需要我的保护

translation.en: How can I just abandon her?
Are you saying no?
I'm saying no.
I'm saying, "No, thank you."
In the days to come,
you'll replay this conversation in your head over and over,
translation.zh: 你会在脑海中一次又一次地 回想这次对话

translation.en: and you're gonna wish you played it differently.
translation.zh: 并且会希望你做出了不同的选择

translation.en: Right now, look at what you have. A thriving business,
translation.zh: 现在 看看你所拥有的吧 蒸蒸日上的生意

translation.en: employees,
a nice face, unbroken bones,
translation.zh: 一张漂亮的脸蛋 还没折的骨头

translation.en: a life.
When this is through, you're not gonna have any of those things.
translation.zh: 等这件事结束 你就不会有这些了

translation.en: Oh really? Do you believe that?
Okay, then.
Marla, I don't want you to get shot in the head,
translation.zh: 玛拉 我不想你的脑袋也挨枪子

translation.en: and I don't wanna get shot either.
So we don't get shot in the head.
Marla, we went after Jennifer Peterson because she was a cherry.
translation.zh: 玛拉 我们找到詹妮弗·彼得森 是因为她是肥羊

translation.en: A cherry with no strings attached, baby, but she, she's a spider web.
translation.zh: 一个无依无靠 没有子女的独居肥羊 但是她 她是盘根错节的蜘蛛网

translation.en: -And we're gonna get trapped in it. -Well, maybe, but maybe not.
translation.zh: -而我们都会被困在网里 -也许会吧 但也许不会

translation.en: They brought guns into a care home. They're the Russian mafia, Marla.
translation.zh: 他们持枪闯进了疗养所 他们是俄罗斯黑手党 玛拉

translation.en: -Ex-Russian mafia. -Marla, pack a fucking bag.
translation.zh: -前俄罗斯黑手党 -玛拉 你他妈打包吧

translation.en: [sighs] Fuck.
Curtis, it's Marla.
Yeah, we saw.
I know. I know.
Yeah, you should close the office. Hang tight for a while. Okay?
translation.zh: 对 你应该关闭办公室 挺过这段时间 好吗？

translation.en: And can you send me a list
translation.zh: 你能尽快给我发一份我们在册的 所有空置未售的房产名单吗？

translation.en: of all the empty, unsold properties on our books as soon as you can?
translation.zh: 你能尽快给我发一份我们在册的 所有空置未售的房产名单吗？ 越快越好

translation.en: Okay.
Thanks. Goodbye.
[Marla] It's gonna be okay.
Jennifer, how are you feeling?
translation.zh: 詹妮弗 你感觉怎么样？

translation.en: Good.
Heard about Dr. Amos.
translation.zh: 听说艾莫斯医生的事了

translation.en: Is Alexi your son?
translation.zh: 亚历克西是你的儿子吗？

translation.en: What? No. That idiot.
translation.zh: 什么？不是 那个蠢货

translation.en: But you are connected to the Russian mafia?
translation.zh: 但是你跟俄罗斯黑手党有关系？

translation.en: He'll kill you next.
I mean, that is unless you get me out of here now.
translation.zh: 我是说 除非你现在让我出去

translation.en: Then he might let you live.
Jennifer, listen to me carefully.
translation.zh: 詹妮弗 你给我听好了

translation.en: I don't lose. I won't lose.
translation.zh: 我的字典里没有“输”这个字 我不会输的

translation.en: I'm never letting you go.
I own you.
And I will drain you of your money, your comfort, and your self-respect.
translation.zh: 我还会榨干你的钱 你的舒适和你的自尊

translation.en: Not because I want to,
not because I'll enjoy it or because I plan for it,
translation.zh: 不是因为我享受这样 或者我计划这么干

translation.en: but because your people didn't play by the rules.
translation.zh: 而是因为你的人不按规矩来

translation.en: You wanna beat me?
Well, come at me fair and square. You get me in a courtroom. You outplay me.
translation.zh: 那就光明正大地冲我来 把我送上法庭 赢过我

translation.en: You don't bring guns into a care home. You don't murder one of my friends.
translation.zh: 你不应该把枪带进疗养院 不应该杀我朋友

translation.en: This is your life now, Jennifer.
translation.zh: 这就是你现在的处境 詹妮弗

translation.en: You are just another old lady in a care home
translation.zh: 你不过是一个有老年痴呆 大小便失禁、关节炎

translation.en: with dementia, with incontinence, with arthritis.
translation.zh: 住在疗养院的老太婆罢了

translation.en: With no one…
except me.
Jennifer,
or whoever the hell you really are,
you're gonna die in here,
alone and in terrible pain.
translation.zh: 独自一人并且承受巨大的病痛

translation.en: [orderly] Hey! Let her go! Let her go!
Come on. Come on.
-There you go. Let her go. Nice and easy. -[Jennifer] Don't! She's the one!
translation.zh: -这就对了 放开她 轻轻地松手 -不要 她才是坏人！

translation.en: She's the one!
[judge] Good Lord.
Marla, are you-- are you okay?
Did she hurt you?
Only superficially.
I got lucky, but what about next time?
translation.zh: 我很幸运 但是下次呢？

translation.en: As you can see, her mental health has severely deteriorated.
translation.zh: 如您所见 她的精神健康严重恶化

translation.en: As this doctor's note describes,
translation.zh: 如这位医生所描述的那样

translation.en: Ms. Peterson has become delusional, paranoid,
translation.zh: 彼得森女士有幻想症、妄想症

translation.en: and violent.
She's a danger to others and herself.
translation.zh: 她对别人和她自己来说 都是个危险的存在

translation.en: And her doctor and I recommend
translation.zh: 她的医生和我本人都建议

translation.en: that she be moved immediately to a secure psychiatric facility
translation.zh: 马上把她送到安全的精神病院

translation.en: where-- where her needs will be more adequately taken care of.
translation.zh: 在那里 她的需求会得到更充分的照顾

translation.en: I agree.
[softly] Don't worry.
This belonged to one of your wards?
translation.zh: 这属于你的一个被监护人？

translation.en: I just need an approximate valuation, Vee.
translation.zh: 我只需要一个大概的价格估计 伊

translation.en: It's a real nice stone. Not the usual dog shit people bring in.
translation.zh: 这块石头品质很高 可不是什么廉价品

translation.en: What are we talking? Retail?
Hmm, 175, maybe 200 grand.
-It's a nice one. -You mind holding on to it for a while?
translation.zh: -这颗很不错的 -你介意替我保管一段时间吗？

translation.en: Keep it in your safe.
-Is it trouble? -Oh no.
No. I just have some errands to run. I don't want it in my purse all day.
translation.zh: 不 我只是要出去跑腿 不想一整天都放在包里

translation.en: Thanks.
Fran says hello.
Oh. She told me to ask after your brother Mikey.
translation.zh: 她让我问问你哥麦奇的情况

translation.en: Mikey?
Yeah, he still in the trade?
Why? You need a fence for this?
In the future, maybe.
Michael still moves stuff here and there.
translation.zh: 迈克尔还在到处做买卖

translation.en: Good to know.
Hey, hey, hey. How'd it go? Did she take the bait on Mikey?
translation.zh: 嗨 怎么样了 她把鱼饵甩给麦奇了吗？

translation.en: Oh yeah. He may be a solution.
translation.zh: 对 他可能是个出路

translation.en: Good.
Hey, did you pack our passports?
translation.zh: 喂 你带了我们的护照吗？

translation.en: Passports.
Fuck.
Shit, baby. No, I didn't. Didn't you?
translation.zh: 我去 宝贝 没有 我没带 你呢？

translation.en: Fuck. No.
I'm close to the house. I can go pick them up if you want me to.
translation.zh: 我离家很近 你想的话 我可以去拿一趟

translation.en: Well, I think we should have them just in case.
translation.zh: 我觉得以防万一 我们应该拿一下

translation.en: -But be careful. -Okay.
-See you back at the place? -Yeah. Okay.
Okay.
Bye.
What happened?
Oh my God. Are you okay?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 你没事吧？

translation.en: -I don't know. I think somebody-- -Oh my God!
translation.zh: -我不知道 我觉得有人… -我的天！

translation.en: Get off me!
Hello, Marla Grayson.
I don't like you.
You only just met me.
You know,
you remind me of someone I knew when I was younger.
translation.zh: 你让我想起了一个我年轻时认识的人

translation.en: She was fiery like you.
Amusing, confident.
Uncooperative.
I cut all her fingers off with a bread knife.
translation.zh: 我用面包刀把她的手指都切掉了

translation.en: She's buried underneath a Jimmy John's now.
translation.zh: 她现在被埋在吉·米约翰餐馆下面了

translation.en: Don't underestimate me.
Who are you?
A dangerous man.
It says that on your business card?
translation.zh: 你的名片上就这样写的？

translation.en: -You should be scared right now. -Why?
Are you gonna make another big fucking speech?
translation.zh: 你要再做一次大型演讲吗？

translation.en: Ow. Jesus fucking Christ.
You stole something from me.
Something more than an old lady.
You know what I'm talking about.
Right now, I have men searching for what you stole.
translation.zh: 现在 我的人正在找你偷的东西

translation.en: They are tearing apart your office, your home,
translation.zh: 他们会掀了你的办公室 你的家

translation.en: and if they do not find what they're looking for,
translation.zh: 并且如果他们没找到该找的

translation.en: I will tear you apart until you tell me where they are.
translation.zh: 我会把你慢慢撕碎 直到你告诉我它们在哪

translation.en: You recognize that woman, Marla?
translation.zh: 玛拉 你认得这个女人吗？

translation.en: That's your mother, isn't it?
translation.zh: 那是你妈妈 不是吗？

translation.en: After I destroy you, I will destroy her.
translation.zh: 我毁了你之后 我会毁了她

translation.en: Go ahead. I don't give a shit about that fucking sociopath.
translation.zh: 随便 我才不在乎那个反社会变态

translation.en: Yeah, I--
I don't like being angry.
I much prefer to be calm.
But you have compromised the life I spent years carefully building.
translation.zh: 但你已经破坏了 我花费多年精心打造的生活

translation.en: Do you know who I am?
No, but I think I can guess.
translation.zh: 不知道 但我觉得我能猜到

translation.en: You're either Nicholas Ignatyev or Roman Lunyov,
translation.zh: 你要么是尼古拉斯·伊格纳捷夫 要么是罗曼·鲁涅夫

translation.en: and my bet is that you're Roman because you seem more like a boss than a soldier.
translation.zh: 我猜你是罗曼·鲁涅夫 因为比起一个战士 你更像一个老板

translation.en: So you faked your own death,
translation.zh: 所以 你伪造了自己的死亡

translation.en: and then were afraid your Cleveland friends
translation.zh: 害怕你克利夫兰的朋友们

translation.en: would use your mother to flush you out, so you turned her into Jennifer Peterson.
translation.zh: 会利用你母亲把你揪出来 所以你把她变成了詹妮弗·彼得森

translation.en: I'm going to kill you now.
Okay.
You're not afraid of death? Do you remember how scary it was in 1807?
translation.zh: -你不怕死？ -你还记得1807年有多恐怖吗？

translation.en: No, me neither, because I wasn't alive yet.
translation.zh: 不 我也不记得 因为我还没出生呢

translation.en: It'll feel the same way when I'm dead.
translation.zh: 但我死的时候 感觉也不会有什么区别

translation.en: Not even nothing. Why be scared of that?
translation.zh: 什么感觉都没有了 为什么要害怕？

translation.en: Anyway, you don't need to kill me.
translation.zh: 总之 你不需要杀我

translation.en: When you sent that lawyer with a case full of money,
translation.zh: 当你派那个带着一整箱钱的律师 过来的时候

translation.en: your instinct was right. I'm entirely willing to be bought off.
translation.zh: 你的直觉是对的 我愿意被收买

translation.en: Your man just came in too low.
translation.zh: 你的人只是出价太低了

translation.en: -Do you have a figure in mind? -Yeah.
I want ten million dollars.
Of-- of-- of course you do.
You are…
you are brave, Ms. Grayson.
translation.zh: 你很勇敢 葛蕾森女士

translation.en: Stupid, but-- but brave.
Well, to make it in this country, you need to be brave.
translation.zh: 要在这个国家成功 你必须勇敢

translation.en: And stupid, and ruthless, and focused,
translation.zh: 还要愚蠢、无情、专心致志

translation.en: because playing fair, being scared, that gets you nowhere.
translation.zh: 因为公平竞争 畏首畏尾 什么都带不来

translation.en: That gets you beat.
You know that.
And I wanna be rich, Mr. Lunyov.
translation.zh: 而我想要有钱 鲁涅夫先生

translation.en: I wanna be very
fucking rich.
And my bet is that ten million dollars, that's not such a big deal for you.
translation.zh: 而我的赌注就是一千万美元 对你来说不是什么大钱

translation.en: But for me, that's a start.
translation.zh: 但对我来说 这只是个开始

translation.en: That's enough to be able to use money as a weapon.
translation.zh: 这样就足够把钱当武器了

translation.en: Like a bludgeon, the way real rich people do.
translation.zh: 当成压迫手段 像真正的有钱人做的那样

translation.en: That's what I want.
You hold no cards. I have your mother, and I have your diamonds.
translation.zh: -你手里没有牌 -我有你妈妈和你的钻石

translation.en: And I've made sure that if I die, you'll never see those diamonds.
translation.zh: 我保证 如果我死了 你永远都别想看到那些钻石了

translation.en: And it'll be so
[laughs] complicated to extricate your mother from her situation
translation.zh: 救你的母亲脱困会非常复杂

translation.en: that it'll take years
before she sees freedom.
translation.zh: 那还需要好几年的努力

translation.en: If she even lives that long.
translation.zh: 如果她能撑到那时候的话

translation.en: Just pay me off.
It's the easiest way.
Get rid of her.
Make sure it looks organic.
translation.zh: 要确保手法看着自然一点

translation.en: You have a payphone?
I'll give you fifty dollars if you let me make a call on your cell.
translation.zh: 如果你让我用下你的手机 我就给你50美元

translation.en: [voicemail] Hey, it's Fran. Leave a message.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是弗兰 请给我留言

translation.en: Can you call me a cab?
translation.zh: 你能给我叫辆出租车吗？

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, Fran!
Oh, baby. No!
Oh my God.
Fran?
Fran!
Marla.
[struggling] I thought we were dead.
No.
We're alive, hon.
translation.zh: 我们还活着 亲爱的

translation.en: -I'm scared. -I'm so fucking sorry.
I'm so sorry.
[softly] It's okay. It's okay.
How are you feeling?
Feeling better.
What's that, Marla?
It's the license plate of the car our Russian friend was driving.
translation.zh: 这是我们俄罗斯朋友开的车的牌照

translation.en: Fran, say the word, and we're gone.
translation.zh: 弗兰 只要你开口 我们就走

translation.en: We start again somewhere new.
translation.zh: 找一个新地方重新开始

translation.en: Just us.
And do what?
We lost everything.
Not quite everything.
We can take them and run.
translation.zh: 我们可以带着它们逃跑

translation.en: Or you can make a call and get me the address
translation.zh: 或者你可以打个电话 帮我问到

translation.en: that that license is registered to.
If we run, we'll always be looking over our shoulders.
translation.zh: 如果我们逃跑的话 我们会永远担惊受怕

translation.en: We'll always be waiting for him to find us.
translation.zh: 我们会永远等着他们找上门来

translation.en: Isn't it better to finish this now?
translation.zh: 现在结束这一切 不是更好吗？

translation.en: You have a plan.
I do.
Will it work?
I don't know.
Give me the phone.
[Fran] Okay, here we are. This is the address for plate F8T444.
translation.zh: 行了 我们到了 这就是牌照F8T444的地址

translation.en: [Marla] That-- That one?
-Yeah. -He can't live here.
Maybe the plate was stolen?
No, the plate definitely matched a black Yukon.
translation.zh: 不 牌照能查到是一辆黑色的育空车

translation.en: Well, go around the back. I wanna get a closer look.
translation.zh: 绕到后面去 我想要靠近点看

translation.en: [Marla] It's not him. It's his driver.
translation.zh: 那不是他 是他的司机

translation.en: Go. He's on the move.
There, follow him!
He's pulling up.
[man] Sir, your car's downstairs.
translation.zh: 先生 你的车到楼下了

translation.en: Be careful.
Hi. Uh…
I have an appointment with Mr. Naylor at Galen and Hersch.
translation.zh: 我约了盖伦与赫尔希公司的奈洛先生

translation.en: It's on the third floor, I think?
I'm actually a little early.
Uh, is there a restroom I could use while I'm waiting?
translation.zh: 在我等的时候 有洗手间可以用一下吗？

translation.en: Uh, sure. It's right around this corner and to your left.
translation.zh: 当然 走过那个转角 在你的左手边

translation.en: Thanks.
Hi, can you help me?
translation.zh: 嗨 你能帮我一下吗？

translation.en: I think I'm on totally the wrong level, and I can't find the exit. Is this B1? Or?
translation.zh: 我觉得我来错楼层了却找不到出口 这是地下一层吗？

translation.en: This is level two. The exit's that way, around the corner.
translation.zh: 这是地下二层 出口就在拐角旁边

translation.en: -Can't I use that elevator right there? -That's a private ele-- [groans]
translation.zh: -我不能坐那边的电梯吗？ -那是私人电…

translation.en: Where is Jackson?
Hello again.
Sir? Hey!
Is he in there?
Lying in a pool of his own urine.
[exhales] You wanna go get rid of him?
Lead the way.
[Marla] How much do you think he weighs? A hundred pounds?
One ten, yeah.
[Fran] Sleep tight, motherfucker.
There you are.
How are you feeling?
Don't try to talk.
You have a tube in your throat.
See that?
You're a John Doe.
You nearly died of an overdose. You're lucky they found you in time.
translation.zh: 你差点死于过量服药 你很幸运 他们及时救了你

translation.en: You wanna hear an interesting fact?
translation.zh: 你想听一个有趣的事实吗？

translation.en: When an incapacitated John Doe is found,
translation.zh: 当一位失去自理能力的无名氏被发现

translation.en: the state automatically appoints them a legal guardian
translation.zh: 政府会自动地替他们 委派一位法定监护人

translation.en: to oversee their treatment and welfare.
translation.zh: 来监督他们的治疗与身心健康

translation.en: You know where this is going, right?
translation.zh: 你知道现在是怎么回事了吧？

translation.en: I'm now your legal guardian.
translation.zh: 我现在是你的法定监护人

translation.en: I got you, John Doe.
translation.zh: 我逮到你了 无名氏

translation.en: I can do whatever I want with you.
translation.zh: 我想对你做什么 就做什么

translation.en: Now let's find a nurse to get that tube out of your throat
translation.zh: 现在我们找个护士 把管子从喉咙里拔出来

translation.en: so you can arrange for ten million dollars
translation.zh: 好让你筹备一千万美元赎金

translation.en: to be moved into my account.
Ding-dong.
How's the throat?
Still painful.
I know you don't like losing,
but as your guardian, I suggest you swallow your pride and pay me off.
translation.zh: 但作为你的监护人 我建议你 放下自尊 然后给我钱

translation.en: You can have your mother,
your diamonds,
your freedom.
You'll never see me again.
Even if I pay you off,
are you not afraid I'll still kill you?
translation.zh: 你不怕我还是会杀了你吗？

translation.en: I'm not afraid, no.
I can make it happen easily.
I know.
But I could just as easily kill you if this thing continues any longer.
translation.zh: 但是这事再拖下去 我也可以很轻易就杀了你

translation.en: Okay.
-Okay? -Let's end this now.
I'll give you the ten million dollars.
I can arrange that.
However--
However?
I'd like to propose an alternative.
translation.zh: 我想提出一个替代方案

translation.en: Instead of me giving you ten million dollars…
we become partners.
Go into business together.
-Are you fucking with me? -No, I'm serious.
translation.zh: -你在耍我吗？ -不 我认真的

translation.en: I mean…
I hate you,
but, ugh,
the money we could make…
You're a rare person, Marla.
translation.zh: 你是个难得的人才 玛拉

translation.en: Your determination is, uh,
frankly, it's scary, but this guardianship grift is ripe.
translation.zh: 坦白说 很吓人 但是这套监护人诈骗体系很成熟

translation.en: But right now, it's small potatoes.
translation.zh: 但现在 还是盘小菜

translation.en: I propose we create a monster.
translation.zh: 我提议我们一起干点大事

translation.en: A countrywide guardianship corporation
translation.zh: 一个全国范围的监护人企业

translation.en: with you as CEO and co-owner.
translation.zh: 你来当首席执行官和合伙人

translation.en: Use my money, use your…
translation.zh: 利用我的资金 利用你的…

translation.en: skills.
Destroy the competition.
Take control of the entire market.
-You wanna start a company with me? -Not just one company.
translation.zh: -你想跟我一起开家公司？ -不只一家公司

translation.en: A corporation with 80 different companies all registered offshore,
translation.zh: 一家拥有80个海外注册分公司的 联合集团

translation.en: charging each other invoices, burying profit.
translation.zh: 互相开具发票 掩盖利润

translation.en: A real estate arm, a legal arm, a training arm,
translation.zh: 有一个真正的房地产团队 一个法律团队 一个培训团队

translation.en: a medical arm, a pharmaceutical arm.
translation.zh: 一个医疗团队 一个制药团队

translation.en: -Our own chain of care homes. -Exactly.
translation.zh: -我们自己的疗养院产业链 -没错

translation.en: With thousands of guardians working for us,
translation.zh: 有几千个监护人为我们工作

translation.en: with hundreds of thousands of wards in our care.
translation.zh: 有成千上万的被监护人受我们照顾

translation.en: That way, you win…
but I win too.
And we make each other billions of dollars
translation.zh: 我们让对方成为亿万富翁

translation.en: legally…
mostly.
What about the diamonds?
Fuck the diamonds.
Split them 50-50.
How do we trust each other?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么互相信任呢？

translation.en: If we make each other rich,
translation.zh: 如果我们让彼此有钱了

translation.en: the trust will follow.
So are you in?
[Marla] Every fortune ever accumulated started with a leap of faith.
translation.zh: 所有的财富都是从大胆地尝试开始

translation.en: But before you take that leap,
first take a long, hard look at yourself.
translation.zh: 首先 花点时间好好审视一下自己

translation.en: Know who you are.
Ask yourself.
Am I an insider
or am I an outsider?
Am I a lamb?
Or am I a lion?
Am I a predator?
Or am I prey?
translation.zh: （未来监护人培训学院） 还是猎物？

translation.en: Am I good at money?
Or am I good at people?
What am I willing to sacrifice
to achieve my dreams?
Marla Grayson, CEO and founder--
translation.zh: “玛拉·葛蕾森 总裁及创始人…”

translation.en: What lines will I not cross?
translation.zh: 哪条底线是我会坚守的？

translation.en: Don't try to be anyone else.
Just know who you are and use that to your advantage.
translation.zh: 你只要清楚自己是什么样的人 然后把这一点变成自己的优势

translation.en: [Peter] So, who are you?
translation.zh: 那么 你是哪种人呢？

translation.en: [Marla] Me?
I'm just someone who cares.
[Peter] So are you a lion or a lamb?
translation.zh: 所以你是只狮子还是绵羊？

translation.en: [Marla] I'm a lioness.
And I will do whatever I need to do
to protect the people I care about.
-[giggling] -Yeah!
[Peter] You've had amazing success in such a short period of time.
translation.zh: 你在如此短的时间里 取得了惊人的成功

translation.en: Marla, what's your secret?
translation.zh: 玛拉 你的秘诀是什么？

translation.en: There is no secret, Peter.
translation.zh: 没有什么秘诀 皮特

translation.en: All it takes is hard work
translation.zh: 想要成功只有努力工作

translation.en: and the courage and determination to never give up.
translation.zh: 和永不言弃的勇气和决心

translation.en: [Peter] So now you are a rich woman.
translation.zh: 所以你现在是有钱人了

translation.en: How much are you worth? How much do you have in the bank?
translation.zh: 你的身价是多少？ 你在银行里有多少存款？

translation.en: [Fran] You were great!
Ugh. My cheeks are aching from forcing that smile for so long.
translation.zh: 我假笑了那么久 脸都疼了

translation.en: I haven't counted recently.
But you are firmly in the top slice of the 1%.
translation.zh: 但你绝对是1%人群 富豪中的顶级富豪

translation.en: What should we do now?
-Whatever the fuck we want! -[Feldstrom] Hey, bitch!
And you're still only 39. That must feel good.
translation.zh: 你才只有三十九岁 那一定感觉很好

translation.en: Hey, bitch.
-Oh. Listen, I don't have time-- -Marla! [screams]
-[Fran] No! Security! -[man] Oh my God!
My mom died!
[Fran] Help! We need help!
You never let me see her, and she died in there alone, you fucking bitch.
translation.zh: 你从来不让我见她 现在 她孤独地死在那儿了 你个臭婊子

translation.en: -[woman] We need help! -Take the weapon!
Fucking bitch!
Someone call help!
M-- Marla, baby, you're gonna be fine.
translation.zh: 玛拉 宝贝 你会没事的

translation.en: No, look at me, baby. Look at me. Look at me.
translation.zh: 不 看着我 宝贝 看着我

translation.en: Listen to me. You're gonna be fine. You're gonna be-- Marla.
translation.zh: 听我说 你不会有事的 你会… 玛拉

translation.en: Help! [screams] Help!
Marla!
[crying] No, Marla!
N-- No!
Help!
[Peter] So with all the success…
translation.zh: 所以在有这么多成就之后…

translation.en: [screams] Help!
…are you still ambitious?
Are there dreams you still want to achieve?
translation.zh: 你还有梦想要去实现吗？

translation.en: Peter, I am only just getting started.
translation.zh: 皮特 我才刚开始而已

translation.en: [Peter] Marla Grayson, CEO and founder
translation.zh: 玛拉·葛蕾森 葛蕾森监护的

translation.en: of Grayson Guardianships, thank you.
translation.zh: 首席执行官和创始人 谢谢你

translation.en: Thanks. It's been fun.
translation.zh: 谢谢 今天的采访很有趣
